item.title: Kristin add a quote by Maria Semple
item.description: "My heart started racing, not the bad kind of heart racing, like I'm going to die. But the good kind of heart racing, like, Hello, can I help you with something? If not, please step aside because I'm about to kick the shit out of life." -- Maria Semple

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Today the same thing over. I've got it up the tree again." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Madeleine L'Engle
item.description: "You have to write the book that wants to be written. And if the book will be too difficult for grown-ups, then you write it for children." -- Madeleine L'Engle

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Brent Runyon
item.description: "So what does that make you think about God? I think that maybe, if human beings have souls, that maybe their souls are in their eyes. That maybe that's what the color is. Their souls." -- Brent Runyon

item.title: Kristin add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "I solemnly swear that I am up to no good." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Kristin add a quote by A.A. Milne
Kristin add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "A person's a person, no matter how small." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Kristin add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Let us step into the night and pursue that flighty temptress, adventure." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "Kiss me, and you will see how important I am." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Dave Barry
item.description: "You should not confuse your career with your life." -- Dave Barry

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Kristin add a quote by J. K. Rowling
item.description: "The thing about growing up with Fred and George," said Ginny thoughtfully, "is that you sort of start thinking anything's possible if you've got enough nerve." -- J. K. Rowling

item.title: Kristin add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If ever there is tomorrow when we're not together... there is something you must always remember. You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think. But the most important thing is, even if we're apart... I'll always be with you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Listen to the mustn'ts, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Kristin add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "One can never have enough socks," said Dumbledore. "Another Christmas has come and gone and I didn't get a single pair. People will insist on giving me books." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Douglas Coupland
item.description: "Here's my theory about meetings and life: the three things you can't fake are erections, competence and creativity." -- Douglas Coupland

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Jasper Fforde
item.description: "Mr. McGregor's a nasty piece of work, isn't he? Quite the Darth Vader of children's literature." -- Jasper Fforde

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "It was sometimes difficult to reconcile a man's talents with his personality." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "The Angel Gabriel disappeared once for sixty years and they found him on earth hiding in the body of a man named Miles Davis." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Kristin add a quote by John Keats
item.description: "I almost wish we were butterflies and liv'd but three summer days - three such days with you I could fill with more delight than fifty common years could ever contain." -- John Keats

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Tina Fey
item.description: "To say I’m an overrated troll, when you have never even seen me guard a bridge, is patently unfair." -- Tina Fey
